get.description: Get the list of all users in the organization. This list includes all users even if they are disabled or unverified.

parameters.description: Number of users to return for a given page.
parameters.name: page[size]

parameters.description: User attribute to order results by. Sort order is ascending by default. Sort order is descending if the field is prefixed by a negative sign, for example `sort=-name`. Options: `name`, `modified_at`, `user_count`.
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Filter all users by the given string. Defaults to no filtering.
parameters.name: filter

parameters.description: Filter on status attribute. Comma separated list: Active, Pending, and Disabled. Defaults to no filtering.
parameters.name: filter[status]

tags.description:
[Interact with your dashboard lists](https://docs.datadoghq.com/monitors/downtimes)
through the API to make it easier to organize, find, and share all of your dashboards
with your team and organization.
tags.name: Dashboard Lists
